_sText:
PARKERS PIT - ZOMBIE ESCAPE
===========================

CREATED BY JB_GAMBLE

FEATURES
========

64 PLAYERS

12 ACHIEVEMENTS

GAS CAN TRAPS

5 ENDINGS

ACHIEVEMENTS
============


### 1. LET'EM BURN - WEAPON UNLOCK - THE IGNITER

Set fire to Zombies using 3 gas can traps.

### 2. MELON KILLER - ITEM UNLOCK - UNLIMITED AMMO CRATE

Find and destroy 6 melons.

### 3. JUMP THE GAP

All Humans jump the rock pit without anyone falling in. ( 50 POINTS - TEAM )

### 4. STAY BACK! - ITEM UNLOCK - FIRST AID KIT

Keep Zombies off the back platform of the lift. ( 50 POINTS - TEAM )

### 5. DEFEAT THE ADVISORS

Kill the Combine Advisors. ( 175 POINTS - TEAM )

### 6. HEADS UP

Land on the Combine Advisors head. ( 175 POINTS - INDIVIDUAL )

### 7. MR B. HOP

Get from the Mine entrance to the end of the small tunnel in 8 seconds or less. ( 75 POINTS - INDIVIDUAL )

### 8. BRING THE GNOME

Find and take the Gnome to every ending. ( 50 POINTS - INDIVIDUAL )

### 9. 10 OR MORE

Have 10 or more Humans at the first ending. ( 50 POINTS - TEAM )

### 10. 12 OR MORE

Have 12 or more Humans at the second ending. ( 50 POINTS - TEAM )

### 11. 15 OR MORE

Have 15 or more Humans at the third ending. ( 75 POINTS - TEAM )

### 12. 18 OR MORE

Have 18 or more Humans at the fourth ending. ( 100 POINTS - TEAM )

UPDATES
=======

**B8**

- Added More Hold Points
- Round 2 Ending Hold Changed
- Round 2 Door Timing Changed
- Round 2 Airboat Speed Increase
- Round 4 Train Hold Changed
- Fixed Zombie Train Glitch Message
- Fixed Round 5 Lift Glitch
- Adjusted Boss Health
- Adjusted Damage To Electric Pool
- Adjusted Container Jump Spot
- Minor Adjustments To Overall Map
- Minor Visual Changes/Fixes

**B7**

- Added Zombie Detector on Round 4 End Train
- Added Boss Health Indicator
- Added Helpful Info At Boss
- Added Ammo Resupply at Boss
- Added Igniter Secondary Ability ( Extinguishes Fire On Humans )
- Added Damage Filter to Gas Cans
- Added Trigger_Remove at Round 2 Doors
- Minor Adjustments To Overall Map

**B6**

- Minor Visual Changes/Fixes
- Round 2 Ending Hold Changed
- Added Ammo To Pickup Weapons
- Removed Zombie Block On Round 4 End Train
- Minor Balance Changes
- Fixed Round 1 Achievement Glitch
- Fixed Combine Advisors Push
- Fixed Zombies Strafe Jumping Round 3 Lift

**B5**

- Fixed Round 5 Nuke Glitch
- Small Balance Changes
- Added Info On Weapon Unlocks
- Removed A Doorway at Spawn

**B4**

- Fixed Nuke Glitch
- Balance Adjustments
- Added 3 New Achievements
- Added 2 New Unlockable Item
- Music Adjustable Via Audio Options

**B3**

- Fixed Crash
- Big Optimization
- Added Achievements
- Fixed Missing Textures
- Added Helpful Info i.e *** Door Open - 5 Seconds ***
- Balanced Round 3 Lift Ending
- Balanced Round 4 Bridge Ending
- Graphical Changes
- Admin Room - Select Any Round / Nuke Button

FEEDBACK
========

Bugs, Glitches and Gameplay Issues
